name: Michigan
blurb: Well..we sure found out more about this team at Players Era. Don't think the offense will sustain this level but defense should travel. The road win at TCU is also aging extremely well.

name: Purdue
blurb: Took care of business in the Bahamas but Michigan just did more this past week.

name: Michigan State
blurb: Just continue to bludgeon teams. Might have the highest floor of any team in the conference but still lacking a wing threat.

name: Illinois
blurb: This team doesn't really have an identity and that's concerning. Don't really defend that well, don't shoot well and the rebounding the past two weeks has been suspect.

name: Iowa
blurb: Bennet Stirtz is my darkhorse B10 POY if Braden Smith slips up.

name: Wisconsin
blurb: Really disappointing loss to TCU. Boyd and Blackwell have been good but the supporting cast, not so much.

name: Indiana
blurb: The win against Marquette is losing luster every day.

name: Nebraska
blurb: Pryce Sandfort has been a pleasant surprise.

name: Northwestern
blurb: Chris Collins finally has a big man that can score in Arrinten Page. This team will struggle with consistency but they are going to be a tough out.

name: Washington
blurb: Moving this team down for the sole reason that their non-conference schedule is a joke. Being off for 9 days in mid-November makes no sense.

name: UCLA
blurb: Bit concerning that Mick Cronin had to bench four starters to send a message. This is the one of the oldest teams in the sport...

name: USC
blurb: Won the Great Value Maui Invitational but don't think this team has the horses to survive in conference play.

name: Ohio State
blurb: Looked very unimpressive in a close win over Notre Dame. Just not seeing the vision this year for this team.

name: Oregon
blurb: This is just a boring team.

name: Maryland
blurb: Played a tough schedule in Vegas but the defense just got obliterated. Going to be a long year.

name: Minnesota
blurb: Three straight Ls in non-conference play is never a good sign especially when you are not playing ranked teams.

name: Penn State
blurb: Big fan of Kayden Mingo but that's about it.

name: Rutgers
blurb: Not surprising but a brutal showing in Vegas. I don't see how Pikiell survives this season with his job.
